metadataAttributes.Title: Spring Framework Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Master Spring Frameworks Configurations Techniques. Discover how Java interacts with databases in the Spring framework, and develop Java based Web Applications.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Spring Framework, Netflix OSS, Java Programming, Spring Configuration, Spring Data, Spring Configuration Techniques, Inversion Of Control, Dependency Injection, Junit, Restful services, Spring Boot, Spring Support for JPA,
